document_data.name: Gurden
document_data.mainbody: '''Gurden''' was a [[desert dwarf]] trader for the [[Rockjaw clan]] in [[Mitzlato]] in the [[Pasocada Basin]] in [[Maztica]].
document_data.History: In [[1362 DR]], Gurden attended the welcoming party for [[Sozarro]]'s expedition.
